dcd9c18e-1299-4664-b008-c36cd5cc7c74.description: A certified LSS Green Belt has proven to run at least one DMAIC optimization project largely independently with the support of a Master Black Belt / Black Belt. By proceeding systematically with DMAIC, the GB can bring the necessary transparency to processes in order to identify potential for improvement.

dfe83d2e-e205-4dde-b4a3-8e8cb3717b77.description: A certified LSS Black Belt has proven to run at least two DMAIC optimization projects with a team largely independently and sucessully. 2f1b74f1-150f-4467-a396-2d60b8b65330.description: A certified Junior Consultant has a broad range of competencies relevant to consulting. Theoretical knowledge based on 6 categories -project management, strategy, business excellence, IT, soft skills, finance and law- forms the foundation. Finally, the theoretical knowledge is applied to a concrete problem. Based on the assessment of experienced consultants, the performance of junior consultants is evaluated in terms of solution development strategy, teamwork skills and presentation of results.
2f1b74f1-150f-4467-a396-2d60b8b65330.name: JCNetwork CJC

issuer.summary: issued by UMS Consulting - Energizing people and organizations

entity.name: UMS Consulting - Energizing people and organizations

badge_template_activities.title: Within the six categories project management, strategy, business excellence, IT, soft skills and finance and law the junior consultants gain both basic and advanced expertise in professionally relevant fields of competence in at least 51 training hours.
Case Study - Working on a case study taken from everyday counselling life in a team and developing possible solution options or recommendations for action.

JCNetwork Certified Junior Consultants have completed at least one project on behalf of an external project partner with a scope of minimum five counselling days (8 hours each) as well as a second external project or an internal project with the scope of fifteen counselling days or leadership experience for six months for more than four members.

Only members of JCNetwork e.V. or one of its member associations would be able to submit the courses and experience to register for the final examination with UMS Consulting GmbH & Co. KG and earn the certificate.
